name: ATM_ACTIVITY_INFO
description: The ATM_ACTIVITY_INFO table contains information about billing activities.

columns.name: ATM_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the billing activity record.

columns.name: ATM_NAME
columns.description: The name of the billing activity.

columns.name: EXTERNAL_IDENT
columns.description: The external ID for the billing activity record.
